summary: A structured container that holds the pooled embeddings and detailed outputs produced by the three sub‑encoders of a FLAVA model—image, text, and multimodal—allowing callers to retrieve the representation tensors and the full encoder outputs in a single object.
business_intent: Enable downstream systems to access unified multimodal representations for tasks such as similarity search, contrastive training, classification, or any application that requires combined image‑text features, while also exposing the raw encoder outputs for further analysis or fine‑tuning.
